```{python}
#| label: load-packages
import itables
from oss_dashboard.utils import format_data
```

```{python}
#| label: load-data
#| message: false

niu_data = format_data("oss_dashboard/data/data_neuroinformatics-unit.json")
brainglobe_data = format_data("oss_dashboard/data/data_brainglobe.json")

itables.options.classes="display nowrap cell-border"
itables.options.buttons = ["csv", "colvis"]
itables.options.columnControl=["order", "searchDropdown"]
itables.options.ordering = {"indicators": False, "handler": False}
```


## Row {.tabset}
```{python}
#| title: "Neuroinformatics Unit"
itables.show(niu_data, fixedColumns={"start": 1, "end": 0}, scrollX=True, columnDefs=[{"className": "dt-left", "targets": "_all"}, {"targets": [-3, -5, -7], 'visible': False}], order=[[0, "desc"]],)
```

```{python}
#| title: "BrainGlobe"
itables.show(brainglobe_data, fixedColumns={"start": 1, "end": 0}, scrollX=True,  columnDefs=[{"className": "dt-left", "targets": "_all"}, {"targets": [-3, -5, -7], 'visible': False}])
```
